DOC.brief_summary: The goal study evaluate safety tolerability multiple ascend dos PF-04455242 administer orally healthy adult subject . In addition , plasma urine pharmacokinetics multiple ascend dos PF 04455242 administer orally healthy adult subject evaluate . Finally , effect multiple-doses PF-04455242 serum prolactin concentration explore .
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Dose Study To Determine Safety , Tolerability And Pharmacokinetics Of PF-04455242 In Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject without childbearing potential age 21 55 year , inclusive . ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12 lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy ) .
DOC.keyword: An investigator subject blind ( sponsor open )
dose escalation design PF 04455242 match placebo .
